successes.description: Thank you for making MARTIAN WATCHES successful! After funding closes, visit www.martianwatches.com to pre-order.

Pledges.description: A heartfelt thank-you by email and your name published on our web site as a Kickstarter backer.

Extra Martian Watch band and band changing tool. You may choose ONLY ONE extra band per Martian watch ordered. Choose any watch band from the photos - silicone, leather, or stainless steel - for only $15 (retail $17.95-29.95), including band changing tool! To receive an extra band, simply add $15 to your pledge in the watch category for each band. There is no additional shipping cost - we will include it in your watch order. Confirmation of band style will be performed via email after the campaign closes on September 30th. Note: Victory bands are recommended only for Victory watches.
NOTE:  ALL WATCH COLORS FOR ALL 3 STYLES WILL BE SELECTED VIA EMAIL TO BACKER AT TIME OF PROJECT FUNDING
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: One MARTIAN G2G Watch of your choice (5 colors to choose from). Free UPS ground shipping in the continental United States. For worldwide shipping, please add $15.
One MARTIAN G2G Watch of your choice. Free UPS ground shipping in the continental United States. For worldwide shipping, please add $15.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: One MARTIAN Victory Watch of your choice (4 models to choose from). Free UPS ground shipping in the continental United States. For worldwide shipping, please add $15.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: One MARTIAN Passport Watch of your choice (3 models to choose from). Free UPS ground shipping in the continental United States. For worldwide shipping, please add $15.

Two MARTIAN G2G Watches of your choice.  Free UPS ground shipping in the continental United States. For worldwide shipping, please add $20.
Two MARTIAN Watches of your choice, any style.  Free UPS ground shipping in the continental United States. For worldwide shipping, please add $20.
Five MARTIAN Watches of your choice, any style.  Free UPS ground shipping in the continental United States. For worldwide shipping, please add $20.
Twelve MARTIAN Watches of your choice, any style. Free UPS shipping worldwide.
